articles.author: Zack Colman
articles.title: Double down on push to abandon fossil fuels, 82 countries urge at climate summit - Politico
articles.description: Governments across Europe, the Pacific islands, Latin America and Africa embraced the call. The United States did not.
articles.content:
Even so, this is a coalition of Global North and Global South saying with one voice that this is an issue that cannot be ignored, U.K. Energy Secretary Ed Miliband said at a press conference.
